channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Vote: Who is Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship softball team
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the fast-pitch softball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: MLB Draft: Venice High grad Marek Houston projected to be first rounder
item.description: After his senior season on the Venice High baseball team, Marek Houston received an invitation to attend the Major League Baseball Draft Combine in San Diego.

item.title: Secret Prime deal: 43% off Crest 3D Whitestrips with Light
item.description: Everyone knows about Crest Whitestrips. They're great and they're currentlyon sale at Amazon. But, if having an evenbrightersmile is on your summer wish list,Amazon Prime Day 2025has a secret discount available on the glow-up you’ve been waiting for.

item.title: We hand-picked last-chance Prime Day deals to shop before midnight
item.description: Tune in for aspecial Amazon Live eventonFriday, July 11at3:00pm ET, where I will reveal the most popular deals from the week and the top last-chance finds you’ll want to shop before Prime Day 2025 ends.

item.title: The craziest Prime Day Apple deals end tonight. Here's what to shop
item.description: Still thinking about pulling the trigger on a new pair of Apple AirPods? I'm here to tell you that you should not wait much longer. The2025 Amazon Prime Day sale endstonight, July 11and the best deals are sure to disappear.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: Like many weeksin Julyandthe Sarasota area's off-season, this week's concert picks largely consist of talented musicians who call Florida home. However, we do kick things off with a reggae musician from California, who visits the area while on tour with a group from Maryland.

item.title: As prosecutions rise, fearful immigrants pick fast-track…
item.description: In a cold courtroom in downtown Tallahassee, Isabela Hurtado sat in a wooden pew. It had been over a month since she last saw her father.

item.title: Steube plays ugly politics with One Big Beautiful Bill…
item.description: "Borrow and Spend" CongressmanGreg Steubeof Sarasota says theOne Big Beautiful Bill– which was recentlysigned into law– will cut taxes for Americans.

item.title: Avelo extends Florida flight schedule through February. What to know
item.description: Avelo Airlines, which has come under fire for agreeing to transport detained immigrants, announced July 9 it is extending its East Coast flight schedule to mid-February 2026. Avelo has routes to 11 Florida airports.
